email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hi everyone!
We hope you've all had a nice week with your Valentine (thanks for being here for me WACC)! This week we have a couple of exciting announcements to make so keep reading to find out more!
email.heading: REVEL IS BACK - this time 'Under The Stars'!
email.text:
**After 2 years** of suspense and excitement, we are **bringing back Revel**, an annual **black-tie cocktail party** co-hosted DoCSoc and RCSU!
From Spanish rooftop bars to period gin mills, we're now bringing you to somewhere enchanted in the middle of **Holborn** so you can **Revel Under The Stars**!
Make sure to click [**Interested**](https://www.facebook.com/events/677383186632462) to know more about the details!
email.heading: [**2nd and 3rd years**] - Pintos Glasses Collection
email.text:
We are thrilled to announce that after 2 years of plain Pintos pain, we can once again distribute our **Pintos Survivor glasses** - and they might come along with a small surprise!
Pop by rooms **217/218** in Huxley on **Tuesday** the 22nd between **11 am and 1 pm** to grab yours!
email.heading: [**1st and 2nd years**] - Freshers' Swag Bags Collection
email.text:
We are very excited to announce that after 2 years of no DoCSoc(ks), we can once again distribute our **Freshers' Swag Bags**!
Pop by rooms **217/218** in Huxley on **Thursday** the 24th between **9 am and 12 pm** to grab yours!
email.heading: DoCSoc General Committee Meeting
email.text: DoCSoc is holding its General Committee Meeting this Tuesday between 6 pm and 8 pm; feel free to join us at HXLY 218 (or [online](https://meet.google.com/vof-nmmt-fgp)) if you'd like to get some insight as to how these meetings work!
email.heading: So You Want To Run For DoCSoc Committee?

event.text:
Thinking of running for DoCSoc committee in this year's Leadership Elections? Come along to this talk, presented by current members of the committee, where we'll be detailing what exactly goes into DoCSoc and what each role entails.
We will be having this event mixed mode at HXLY 340 and on [Google Meet](https://meet.google.com/mww-efsh-vir)
Read more about the Leadership Elections [here](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imperialcollegeunion.org%2Fyour-union%2Fleadership-elections-2022%3Ffbclid%3DIwAR0PkX_G0CQ585fgNEuuWusgUZg5gmlXmyPalPyToEaF5O4WS8OTbXr9ZMA&h=AT1lNH1SbchlN03IqoHJTJJhs48CVjsawhEECowTx1revu55GwkfqoJX_LCfjGAgHHTYY42W658NwWBffyv63dCX6dLQdfc60XAvP_EDQ0IMOqMeFUpg2lSwBbHPqwnKueRyNavQI7p1kZlHSEn-&__tn__=q&c[0]=AT34OOdT3xbsihWhHixusG8CLImtwhY_qC1_IV8b2i2eRhzHipNWaFT3964zbzUJwgml3ptrWLQOP9eHIqc8C4rNDA1h68eWSsB8_gnkrKjbKs5Bnr6iQ6_VQyWOabq8B9G8gLpBuDAH42XhG-eVmzx6JgntiPIZKcfnY_hvaPOblYrGwg)
Nominate yourself [here](https://vote.union.ic.ac.uk/)
Don't forget to read the Candidates' Pack & Election Rules [here](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imperialcollegeunion.org%2Finformation-for-candidates-0%3Ffbclid%3DIwAR3klTKipfMfXuAprBUaPWOA8so0L0KDlUw4gg0Yt7sQrCrggkyJhpgsHoE&h=AT18lkpD9Awuc1DNsxvM3ROHrZ-sQEXKG10fgo_Ad2uHgXTlHjDRkUo9ILreIFwWFWTym6RKAelWWE8897lNHXQ3GSzNJ-04FtqcL6iS08xF1QsNSA81KZzxymv0_bwbBcDK3FkK4UB-ffdH3osB&__tn__=q&c[0]=AT34OOdT3xbsihWhHixusG8CLImtwhY_qC1_IV8b2i2eRhzHipNWaFT3964zbzUJwgml3ptrWLQOP9eHIqc8C4rNDA1h68eWSsB8_gnkrKjbKs5Bnr6iQ6_VQyWOabq8B9G8gLpBuDAH42XhG-eVmzx6JgntiPIZKcfnY_hvaPOblYrGwg)
Breaking election rules can result in disqualification.
See you there!

email.heading: HashCode - Imperial Hub - Qualification Round

event.text:
Google HashCode is back once again!
Join the Imperial Hub for another night of fun hacking and coding and for the chance to get your team in the finals!
Registration closes Feb 23 2022 at 11:00 (UTC). Enter the competition [here](https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode/register).
Remember to join Imperial hub and click going on the Facebook event for food!

email.heading: DoCSoc Netflix Stars
email.text:
I used to think that some DoCSoc committee members were cast for roles in a Netflix [show](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7134908/) - would definitely suit their attitudes after all.
However, I haven't been hearing much gossip about it lately which makes me think it was false news, and, not gonna lie, I'm beginning to get sad :'( ...
